content:
<rule id="removed-javaee-modules-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <javaclass references="javax.activity.{*}">
                        <location>IMPORT</location>
                    </javaclass>
                    <javaclass references="javax.rmi.{*}">
                        <location>IMPORT</location>
                    </javaclass>
                    <javaclass references="com.sun.corba.{*}">
                        <location>IMPORT</location>
                    </javaclass>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="The java.corba module has been removed from OpenJDK 11">
                    <message>
                        The `java.corba` (CORBA) module has been removed from OpenJDK 11.  
                        If you wish to continue using CORBA within your application consider using the GlassFish implementation of CORBA and RMI-IIOP.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://javaee.github.io/glassfish-corba/index.html" title="GlassFish implementation of CORBA and RMI-IIOP"/>
                    <link href="https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/11-relnote-issues.html#JDK-8190378" title="Removed Java EE modules"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
